author: Kathryn Rubino
title: Senior Government Attorney Pleads Guilty To Child Pornography Charge
text: Senior Government Attorney Pleads Guilty To Child Pornography Charge He could spend the rest of his life behind bars. A senior attorney at the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), Mark Black, pleaded guilty to one count of conspiracy to produce child pornography and one count of coercion and enticement. According to reports, Black was a member of two online groups dedicated to finding prepubescent girls and having them record sexually explicit content. As reported by Reuters: The Justice Department said Black induced a minor to engage in such conduct in 2019 and secretly recorded it. Also in 2019, he and an unnamed co-conspirator also convinced another girl to engage in similar acts on a livestream, which was also secretly recorded and shared. Black faces between 15 years and a lifetime in prison. He will be sentenced April 30.
